Function Removal: get_payment_status

info Change Summary

The get_payment_status function has been removed from the demo_api.py module in commit 02e9c985c170f9d7e454555f5b9476f571160cc6.

Purpose

This documentation records the removal of the get_payment_status function, which previously provided payment status lookup functionality. The function was designed to retrieve the current status of a payment transaction using a payment identifier.

Removed Function Details

Function Signature

python Removed Function str: """Get the current status of a payment. Args: payment_id: Payment ID to check Returns: Payment status """ return "pending"]]>

Parameters

Parameter Type Required Description
payment_id str Yes Payment ID to check status for

Return Value

Type Description
str Payment status (was hardcoded to return "pending")

Previous Usage Example

python Previous Usage

Impact Analysis

warning Breaking Change

This is a breaking change. Any code that previously called get_payment_status() will now fail with a NameError.

Affected Dependencies

The following functions in the same module may have been impacted:

  • refund_payment_safe - May have used payment status checking logic
  • send_payment_notification - Could have relied on payment status validation
  • generate_invoice - May have required payment status verification

Migration Notes

If payment status functionality is still required, consider:

  • Using alternative functions within the payment API
  • Implementing a replacement function with proper status logic
  • Integrating with external payment status services
  • Reviewing if the functionality was moved to another module
